name: VNC Server (Reflective Injection), Reverse TCP Stager (DNS)
author: sf <stephen_fewer@harmonysecurity.com>
hdm <x@hdm.io>
skape <mmiller@hick.org>
RageLtMan
description: Inject a VNC Dll via a reflective loader (staged). Connect back to the attacker

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: LHOST
options.description: The DNS hostname to connect back to

options.name: LPORT
options.description: The listen port

options.name: ReverseListenerBindPort
options.description: The port to bind to on the local system if different from LPORT

options.name: ReverseAllowProxy
options.description: Allow reverse tcp even with Proxies specified. Connect back will NOT go through proxy but directly to LHOST

options.name: ReverseListenerComm
options.description: The specific communication channel to use for this listener

options.name: ReverseListenerBindAddress
options.description: The specific IP address to bind to on the local system

options.name: ReverseListenerThreaded
options.description: Handle every connection in a new thread (experimental)

options.name: StagerRetryCount
options.description: The number of times the stager should retry if the first connect fails

options.name: StagerRetryWait
options.description: Number of seconds to wait for the stager between reconnect attempts

options.name: PingbackRetries
options.description: How many additional successful pingbacks

options.name: PingbackSleep
options.description: Time (in seconds) to sleep between pingbacks

options.name: PayloadUUIDSeed
options.description: A string to use when generating the payload UUID (deterministic)

options.name: PayloadUUIDRaw
options.description: A hex string representing the raw 8-byte PUID value for the UUID

options.name: PayloadUUIDName
options.description: A human-friendly name to reference this unique payload (requires tracking)

options.name: PayloadUUIDTracking
options.description: Whether or not to automatically register generated UUIDs

options.name: EnableStageEncoding
options.description: Encode the second stage payload

options.name: StageEncoder
options.description: Encoder to use if EnableStageEncoding is set

options.name: StageEncoderSaveRegisters
options.description: Additional registers to preserve in the staged payload if EnableStageEncoding is set

options.name: StageEncodingFallback
options.description: Fallback to no encoding if the selected StageEncoder is not compatible

options.name: PrependMigrate
options.description: Spawns and runs shellcode in new process

options.name: PrependMigrateProc
options.description: Process to spawn and run shellcode in

options.name: EXITFUNC
options.description: Exit technique (Accepted: '', seh, thread, process, none)

options.name: PayloadBindPort
options.description: Port to bind reverse tcp socket to on target system.

options.name: VNCPORT
options.description: The local port to use for the VNC proxy

options.name: VNCHOST
options.description: The local host to use for the VNC proxy

options.name: DisableCourtesyShell
options.description: Disables the Metasploit Courtesy shell

options.name: ViewOnly
options.description: Runs the viewer in view mode

options.name: AUTOVNC
options.description: Automatically launch VNC viewer if present

options.name: DisableSessionTracking
options.description: Disables the VNC payload from following the active session as users log in an out of the input desktop
